name: hyperapp
description: The tiny framework for building hypertext applications
author: Jorge Bucaran

scripts.build: export dir=${p:+pkg/$p/} p=$npm_package_name$p; npm run bundle && npm run minify && npm run unpkg
scripts.create: npm run build && git commit -am $msg && git tag -s $msg -m $msg && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release: env msg=$(npm run -s message) npm run create && cd ./${p:+pkg/$p} && npm publish --access public
scripts.postinstall: echo "Love Hyperapp? Please support me on GitHub <https://github.com/sponsors/jorgebucaran>"
